title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
blurb: In visual novel form, it's almost like the sober examination of the unrestrained materialism and absent moral center of the Roaring Twenties jumps right out at you! (I haven't actually seen the 2013 adaptation referenced by that Norm bit, but apparently Nick was played by Spider-Man.)
blurb2: Leave it to Scott to take all the fun out of a reclusive yet rich and mysteriously well-connected man inviting hordes of other rich and powerful men to "party" with "young women" on his estate on an island.
